s1.title: The usual Cocoon Developer profile
s1.p: As a Cocoon developer (someone who develops components for Cocoon), you need of course everything you have to know as a Cocoon user. In addition you should have a basic understanding of the following technologies. Again, this knowledge is not specific to Cocoon; it can be used for building web applications with different frameworks as well.

ul.li: The Java Language and Application Frameworks

s1.title: Overview
s1.p: Here will soon appear an overview of the developer perspective.
If you are interested in developing real-world web-applications requiring form handling, authentication or even developing your own portal, have a look at the web application documentation.
The actual developer documentation is available from the side-panel.
